text: Antioghɨn itir Kraisɨn adarasi, men marazi Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba ko tisaba. Men ziabar kara: Barnabas, ko Simeon (an ziar mam Niger) ko Sairinin gumazim Lusius, ko Manain (a Atrivim Herotɨn roroam, a Herot koma aghungi) ko Sol.13:1 Ziar kam Niger, an mɨngarim kamaghɨn ghu, “pɨzim.” Gumazir maba ghaze, Simeon Niger, a Afrikan gumazim.
